name: International Organization for Refugee Affairs Care
goal: To assist refugees (political, war, economic, social) either when they are internally displaced, being in neighbouring countries or in (developed) other countries.
interests: Climate Action, Education, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
- Frontex,
- EU Agency fundamental rights,
- European Asylum Support Office,
- Annual Report fundamental rights,
- EU general budget,
- Conflict minerals,
- Early and forced marriages,
- Rights indigenous people,
- Development Cooperation Instrument.
